channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Taylor Swift Surprises Tight End University Crowd With ‘Shake It Off’ Performance
item.description: 🎤 Taylor Swift brings the party to Tight End University 🏈🎶 Who else wishes they were there? #TaylorSwift #ShakeItOff

item.title: HAIM Say Stevie Nicks Is ‘The Greatest Human Being’ While Teasing New Song
item.description: 🔥 HAIM declaring Stevie Nicks 'The Greatest Human Being' has us all begging for that new song! 🎶 #LegendsSupportingLegends

item.title: Olivia Rodrigo Covers Fontaines D.C.’s ‘I Love You’ in Dublin
item.description: 🌟 Olivia Rodrigo brings her magic to Dublin with a dreamy cover of Fontaines D.C.'s 'I Love You'! 🎶✨ #MusicMagic #OliviaRodrigo

item.title: Doechii and Tyler, the Creator Song ‘Get Right’ Debuts at Louis Vuitton Fashion Show
item.description: 🚀 Doechii and Tyler, the Creator bring the heat at Louis Vuitton with 'Get Right' 🔥💃 #FashionShowVibes

item.title: Cut Copy Announce New Album Moments: Hear “When This Is Over”
item.description: New @cutcopy vibes alert! 🚨🎶 Press play on "When This Is Over" from their upcoming album Moments. Let's dance! 💃 #NewMusicAlert
